tool_description: Get the very latest ads and data with Adzuna's API. Get job, property and car ads for your own website. Use Adzuna's up-to-the-minute employment data to power your own website, reporting and data visualisations.
name: Adzuna
title: Adzuna

api_list.name: Salary data

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: ISO 8601 country code of the relevant country.

optional_parameters.name: what
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: location0
optional_parameters.description: The locationN fields may be used to describe a location, in a similar form to that returned in a Adzuna::API::Response::Location object.

optional_parameters.name: where
optional_parameters.description: The geographic centre of the search. Place names or postal codes may be used.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category tag, as returned by the "category" endpoint.

api_list.name: Histogram data
api_list.description: Provide histogram data of salary data

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: ISO 8601 country code of the relevant country.

optional_parameters.name: what
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: where
optional_parameters.description: The geographic centre of the search. Place names or postal codes may be used.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category tag, as returned by the "category" endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: location0
optional_parameters.description: The locationN fields may be used to describe a location, in a similar form to that returned in a Adzuna::API::Response::Location object.
